segments.text: Well , Mr . Smith . That's a nasty infection you have .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Is there anything you can give me to get rid of it , doctor ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to prescribe some antibiotics and some cream to ease the itching and burning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , thank you ! Where should I buy them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The pharmacy will give you a discount since you came to the clinic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! What floor is pharmacy on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The fourth . I'll send the prescription down there so you can just pick it up on your way out .
segments.speaker: S1
